entry.title: [WW] I'm taking a break from my ADHD meds. I switched to 10mg XRs about a year ago,
entry.content:
I'm taking a break from my ADHD meds. I switched to 10mg XRs about a year ago, and after taking an accidental break from them for a weekend, found my depression lifting a surprising amount. Time passes much faster, I find it easier to sleep. I find it easier to think creatively. My performance at work is suffering, but coffee+nicotine+weak weed seems to be getting me through this week compared to last week. I feel less helpless anxiety when faced with tasks. I feel better able to keep myself company.
I still hate my life, but the experience of living it is less irritating to me now.
I'm going to see a different, less-intrusive doctor and get switched back to regular release, maybe up the daily dosage to 20, but see if I can get by only taking 10 or 15. I just know the XRs aren't for me.
Has anyone else had similar experiences with XRs vs regulars? Did you find an alternative to Adderall?
